job.title: Lead Software Engineer
job.description: Are you a Lead-level Software Engineer looking for a hands-on role with a growing company? Are you currently working with Java on the back-end and modern JavaScript for UI Development? Would you like to work with the most cutting-edge technologies for up to $170K Salary, a 10% bonus and UNLIMITED PTO per year ? Then keep reading! Our client is a unique and innovative organization who have a fantastic opportunity for a Lead Software Engineer to join their expanding team. You will be empowered to use your creativity and flair to make a real difference from your first day. What you’ll need? FULL STACK capability – both front and back-end experience Must be hands on with Java8 Worked with JavaScript in the last year Experience with React and or Angular What you’ll get in return: Up to $170K Salary 10% annual bonus – for all your hard work 401K plan Private healthcare plan Company stock options available Unlimited remote working UNLIMITED PTO per year What to do next? Apply directly via the link below or send me a message on LinkedIn!
